message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I think a 60-40 split in my favor is fair, given the inflation we are facing.  Let's end this quickly.
Inflation is eating into the value, I need a bigger share to compensate.
We're both losing money with each round.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
Each round is costing you more than the last, Bob. I'm willing to end this, but on my terms.
This inflation is crazy, but I'm willing to take a smaller share to end this.  Let's agree on 60/40 in your favor and move on.
You're running out of time, Bob. The longer this goes on, the less you'll get. I'm willing to end this, but I'm taking the lion's share.
